attributes.action: Remove Michael Gove from the position of Secretary of State for Education
attributes.additional_details:
Michael Gove, a man of superior intelligence has a made a big mess of the education system, and if not stopped, he will ultimately destroy the education system in Britain. He did an injust thing by forcing the exam boards to increase grade bounderies at the last moment.
Leaving that aside, why on earth has the government ended the travel grant for the students this year, is it because all of the torry parties children can afford to pay for the high priced bus passes or something else?
We think these questions need to be answered...
